name: wordcount
desc: Hitung baris, kata, dan karakter dari input.
author: Termz
command:
print("Masukkan teks (Ctrl+D untuk selesai):")
text = ''
try:
    while True:
        line = input()
        text += line + '
'
except EOFError:
    pass

lines = len(text.splitlines())
words = len(text.split())
chars = len(text)
print("--- Statistik ---")
print(f"Baris: {lines}")
print(f"Kata: {words}")
print(f"Karakter: {chars}")
